name: Steven Universe: Tap Together
description:
Rose’s Room is under attack! Team up with your friends to protect the temple in Tap Together, an unforgettable RPG starring all of your favorite Steven Universe characters.

REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER WITH FRIENDS
Team up in live 4-player co-op battles
Work together with your friends to defeat the daily boss
Compete in Weekly Club Tournaments

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Collect, level up, and gear up your favorite Steven Universe characters, like Steven, Pearl, Connie, and Bismuth
Each hero comes with their own special move
Unlock new abilities for every hero

BATTLE ICONIC BOSSES
Challenge epic bosses, like Red Eye, Frybo, Aquamarine, and Jasper!
Tap, hold, and swipe your way through obstacles and boss powers
Collect new items, heroes, and heaps of XP

BECOME STRONGER, EVEN WHILE YOU’RE AWAY
Don’t give up the fight! Your heroes will continue defeating the bad guys and gaining XP until you return


PLEASE NOTE:
Steven Universe - Tap Together is a completely free Tap RPG game. It’s free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
